messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] The Last Lecture
messages.msgSnippet: Randy Pausch s interview with Diane Sawyer is this Wednesday, April 9th at 10/9c on ABC. http://abcnews.go.com/gma/lastlecture Robin B.
messages.messageBody:
Randy Pausch's interview with Diane Sawyer is this Wednesday, April
9th at 10/9c on ABC.

http://abcnews.go.com/gma/lastlecture

Robin B.

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:The Last Lecture
messages.msgSnippet: Google Randy Pausch Your first hit will be his website, and all of his lectures are there. You can also find him on other hits through Google---YouTube and
messages.messageBody:
Google "Randy Pausch"

Your first hit will be his website, and all of his lectures are there.
You can also find him on other hits through Google---YouTube and such.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandLearnConference.org
